required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on October 07, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Knowledge, Attitudes and Clinical Practices of Pediatric Dentists Regarding Covid-19
clinical_study.official_title: Knowledge, Attitudes and Clinical Practices of Pediatric Dentists Regarding Covid-19

brief_summary.textblock: This study aims to assess the level of knowledge, attitudes and clinical practices of pediatric dentists regarding COVID-19 pandemic outbreak and evaluate the psychological burden on the dentists and children

detailed_description.textblock:
Aim: This cross sectional study aims to assess the level of knowledge, attitudes and clinical practices of pediatric dentists regarding COVID-19 pandemic outbreak and evaluate the psychological burden on the dentists and children.
The study population is pediatric dentists recruited through five pediatric dentists Facebook groups. Web-based questionnaire was created using Google forms, structured of multiple-choice questionnaire, and divided into: (demographic, knowledge, practices, and behavior management techniques) sections. Descriptive statistical analysis was used to describe items included in the survey. Numbers and percentages were used to describe categorical data.

arm_group.description: Pediatric dentists following Facebook groups for pediatric dentists and practicing dentistry nowadays

intervention.description: Questionnaire addressing pediatric dentists behaviors and practices during the COVID-19 pandemic

study_pop.textblock: Pediatric dentists, practicing during the COVID-19 pandemic

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
Practicing pediatric dentists working in private practices or institutions
Exclusion Criteria Dentists specialized in other disciplins

responsible_party.investigator_title: Lecturer of Pediatric Dentistry, Faculty of Dentistry, Fayoum University
